name: Smol Particles
description:
Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Space  - Shield( available every 15 seconds)
  • R - Reload
  • Scroll Wheel - Switch Weapons
  • Left Click - Shoot

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

HOW TO PLAY / SETUP:

  • Download the game and extract it
  • Download Hamachi
  • Create a new Network on Hamachi
  • Give your friends the network name and password
  • Tell your friends to join the network
  • Copy Your IPV4 Address on Hamachi by right clicking the long IP (number)
  • Give your friends this IP
  • Launch the game (Mirror.exe) and click host game
  • Once on the same network with your friends enter the IP into the IP Input Box
  • Friends - Press Connect
  • If it doesn't work wait 1-2 minutes and try and connect again

IF you cant connect and you did all the steps correctly then you have to wait a bit for the server to be properly created, so try again in a few minutes or restart your game.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Aim Of The Game:

  • Have fun with your friends
  • try to kill them :D
